paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant c.3103delC, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Episodes of syncope with remarkable QT interval prolongation.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing in the 41-year-old case patient revealed a mutation in KCNH2 (c.3103delC).

functional_data.summary: The mutation is identified as pathogenic based on previous studies.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was found in the proband with a family history of QT prolongation.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of QT prolongation and TdP.
key_quotes: Genetic testing in the 41-year-old case patient revealed a mutation in KCNH2 (c.3103delC).
The previous study identified the mutation in the cohort of patients with LQTS as pathogenic.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant was successfully extracted.
